![](../assets/project_images/Presentations/arch_pred_map.png){.project-thumb} **Tech:** Presentation A long presentation about the development process of my thesis on the use of machine learning for the construction of archaeological predictive maps. [View slides](https://www.canva.com/design/DAGJKIXq210/teNiFiirdQ4ZA28OLfxzEg/edit?utm_content=DAGJKIXq210&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton){.btn .btn-lilac}
![](../assets/project_images/Presentations/morph_pres.png){.project-thumb} **Tech:** Presentation ### [Automated Geomorphometric Sexual Dimorphism Classification](https://www.canva.com/design/DAGHLKErsS4/ozMGPDsX3SkMQ8oVwzXlag/edit?utm_content=DAGHLKErsS4&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton) An overview of my methodology for improving the workflow at the University of Tübingen for the classification of sexual dimorphism based on the human viscerocranium. [View slides](https://www.canva.com/design/DAGHLKErsS4/ozMGPDsX3SkMQ8oVwzXlag/edit?utm_content=DAGHLKErsS4&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton){.btn .btn-lilac}
![](../assets/project_images/Presentations/sat_arch.png){.project-thumb} **Tech:** Presentation ### [Satellite Based Archaeology - I & II](https://www.canva.com/design/DAGVCEjA6f0/lNGGfWXneahy_V_VjpzBxA/edit?utm_content=DAGVCEjA6f0&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton) A two-part presentation on the use of satellite-based data sources for terrestrial and maritime mapping in archaeology. [View slides](https://www.canva.com/design/DAGVCEjA6f0/lNGGfWXneahy_V_VjpzBxA/edit?utm_content=DAGVCEjA6f0&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton){.btn .btn-lilac}
![](../assets/project_images/Presentations/indust_war.png){.project-thumb} **Tech:** Presentation ### [Human Osteological Taphonomy - Industrial War](https://www.canva.com/design/DAFLXvKIfHo/EXyq-_SsdFz87FpDpdODdA/edit?utm_content=DAFLXvKIfHo&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton) An overview of human osteological taphonomy as it relates to aspects of ancient and modern warfare. [View slides](https://www.canva.com/design/DAFLXvKIfHo/EXyq-_SsdFz87FpDpdODdA/edit?utm_content=DAFLXvKIfHo&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton){.btn .btn-lilac}
